text: Viktor Antonovych Matviyenko (9 November 1948 – 29 November 2018) was a Ukrainian footballer and manager. He was born in Zaporizhia, Ukraine. Matviyenko won the bronze medalist in the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal. He played for Dynamo Kyiv and the USSR national team. He managed Torpedo Zaporizhya. Matviyenko died in Kyiv on 29 November 2018 at the age of 70.Не стало Виктора Матвиенко... ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile Category:1948 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Soviet Union at UEFA Euro 1972
title: Viktor Matviyenko
